name: AVAudioRecorder
desc: An object that records audio data to a file.

items.name: init(url: URL, settings: [String : Any])
items.desc: Creates an audio recorder with settings.

items.name: init(url: URL, format: AVAudioFormat)
items.desc: Creates an audio recorder with an audio format.

items.name: func prepareToRecord() -> Bool
items.desc: Creates an audio file and prepares the system for recording.

items.name: func record() -> Bool
items.desc: Starts or resumes audio recording.

items.name: func record(atTime: TimeInterval) -> Bool
items.desc: Records audio starting at a specific time.

items.name: func record(forDuration: TimeInterval) -> Bool
items.desc: Records audio for the indicated duration of time.

items.name: func record(atTime: TimeInterval, forDuration: TimeInterval) -> Bool
items.desc: Records audio starting at a specific time for the indicated duration.

items.name: func pause()
items.desc: Pauses an audio recording.

items.name: func stop()
items.desc: Stops recording and closes the audio file.

items.name: var isRecording: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the audio recorder is recording.

items.name: func deleteRecording() -> Bool
items.desc: Deletes a recorded audio file.

items.name: var currentTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time, in seconds, since the beginning of the recording.

items.name: var deviceCurrentTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time, in seconds, of the host audio device.

items.name: var channelAssignments: [AVAudioSessionChannelDescription]?
items.desc: An array of channel descriptions associated with the audio recorder.

items.name: var isMeteringEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether youâ€™ve enabled the recorder to generate audio-level metering data.

items.name: func updateMeters()
items.desc: Refreshes the average and peak power values for all channels of an audio recorder.

items.name: func averagePower(forChannel: Int) -> Float
items.desc: Returns the average power, in decibels full-scale (dBFS), for an audio channel.

items.name: func peakPower(forChannel: Int) -> Float
